text:
[Below is a sample response with static data and filled parameters. Unfilled parameters will need a real time webhook response]

Departure Flight RLABKB
Date $session.params.departure_date
Departure Airport $session.params.departure_airport
Time $session.params.departure_time_C
Arrival Airport $session.params.arrival_airport
Arrival Time $session.params.arrival_time_C

The price for this ticket is $session.params.ticket_price

Would you like to proceed with payment?
